price: Afei (Nkͻmhyεni), Yεde wo sii ͻsom no ahyԑdeԑ no ho mmra kwan pefee no so. Enti di akyire, na hwε na w’anni wͻn a wͻnnim no apεdeε akyi.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ فَٱتَّبِعۡهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāka ʿalā sharīʿatin mina al-amri fa-ittabiʿ'hā walā tattabiʿ ahwāa alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
